Connecting Your Wallet â€‹

Step 1: Click Connect â€‹

Click the Connect Wallet button in the top right corner.

Step 2: Select Wallet â€‹

Choose your wallet provider:

  • MetaMask
  • WalletConnect
  • Coinbase Wallet

Step 3: Sign Message â€‹

Sign the authentication message to create your session.

Sign this message to authenticate with WorldLand Cloud:
Timestamp: 2024-01-25T12:00:00Z
Nonce: abc123...

Session Duration

Your session remains active for 24 hours. You'll need to re-authenticate after expiry.

Step 1: Select Provider â€‹

Choose a provider based on:

  • GPU model
  • Availability
  • Price per hour
  • Location
